Plot: It's story of Abril, a mysterious woman with a particular life-style that she stands in the way of Bruno, a Chilean young man who lives in Peru and he's passing through an existential crisis.
Title: An Odd Evening in April
Writer: Sandro Ventura, Ani Alva (collaborating writer), Roberto Valdivieso (collaborating writer)
Actors: Fiorella Rodriguez, Ariel Levy, Adolfo Aguilar, Valeria Bringas
